`,(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:"We use breadcrumbs to display site hierarchy (rather than navigation path) and to increase findability of parent pages."}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:"Breadcrumbs help users navigate upward in the hierarchy and typically help with back-movement also. They also help with context when navigation is otherwise out of sight (for example in a mobile view)."}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:"Breadcrumbs have been proven to reduce bounce rates for search-users, when they are able to quickly find related pages."}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.h2,{id:"when-and-how-to-use-it",children:(0,n.jsx)(e.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#when-and-how-to-use-it",children:"When and how to use it"})}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:"Use for sites/applications that have a substantial amount of pages present deeper down in site structures."}),`
`,(0,n.jsx)(e.h2,{id:"versions",children:(0,n.jsx)(e.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#versions",children:"Versions"})}),`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(a,{columns:2,gapInline:"small",children:[(0,n.jsxs)("div",{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.h3,{id:"desktop",children:(0,n.jsx)(e.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#desktop",children:"Desktop"})}),(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:"The full path may not take up more than one row in the layout."})]}),(0,n.jsx)(t,{node:"1140-242",caption:"Breadcrumb in desktop"})]}),`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(a,{columns:2,gapInline:"small",children:[(0,n.jsxs)("div",{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.h3,{id:"truncated-desktop",children:(0,n.jsx)(e.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#truncated-desktop",children:"Truncated desktop"})}),(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:"If the path is too long the path is truncated after the root element"})]}),(0,n.jsx)(t,{node:"1147-17379",caption:"Truncated breadcrumbs"})]}),`
`,(0,n.jsxs)(a,{columns:2,gapInline:"small",children:[(0,n.jsxs)("div",{children:[(0,n.jsx)(e.h3,{id:"mobile-or-simple",children:(0,n.jsx)(e.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#mobile-or-simple",children:"Mobile or simple"})}),(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:"For mobile views we only display the link to the parent page, as the full path tends to take too much space."}),(0,n.jsx)(e.p,{children:"The same version may be used in shallow hierarchies where there still is a need to easily move one step up, or back to the page from where you came."})]}),(0,n.jsx)(t,{node:"1140-274",caption:"Simplified breadcrumbs"})]})]})}function x(r={}){let{wrapper:e}=r.components||{};return e?(0,n.jsx)(e,Object.assign({},r,{children:(0,n.jsx)(d,r)})):d(r)}var _=x;function l(r,e){throw new Error("Expected "+(e?"component":"object")+" `"+r+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it.")}return y(j);})();
